docker.name: RUN
docker.args: apt - get update && \n        apt - get install --no - install - recommends - y ca - certificates curl build - essential zlib1g - dev && \n        mkdir / app && rm - rf / var / lib / apt / lists
docker.raw: RUN apt - get update && \n        apt - get install --no - install - recommends - y ca - certificates curl build - essential zlib1g - dev && \n        mkdir / app && rm - rf / var / lib / apt / lists
